MBR4.0: aggregate and export to fst

Source: R/aggregate_export_fst.R
aggregate_export_fst_mbr4.Rd

MBR4.0: aggregate and export to fst

aggregate_export_fst_mbr4(
  siteData_raw_list = tidy_mbr4_data(read_mbr4()),
  compression = 100
)

Arguments

siteData_raw_list

tidy MBR4 data as retrieved by tidy_mbr4_data, (default: kwb.pilot::tidy_mbr4_data(kwb.pilot::read_mbr4()))
compression

(default: 100)

Value

exports data for each month into subfolder: /data/fst/year-month

Contents

Developed by Michael Rustler, , SULEMAN.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
